tool.name: BitKeeper
tool.summary: Sets construction variables for the BitKeeper source code control system.

cvar.name: BITKEEPERCOM
cvar.summary: The command line for fetching source files using BitKeeper.

cvar.name: BITKEEPERCOMSTR
cvar.summary: The string displayed when fetching a source file using BitKeeper. If this is not set, then &cv-link-BITKEEPERCOM; (the command line) is displayed.

cvar.name: BITKEEPERGET
cvar.summary: The command (&cv-link-BITKEEPER;) and subcommand for fetching source files using BitKeeper.

cvar.name: BITKEEPERGETFLAGS
cvar.summary: Options that are passed to the BitKeeper get subcommand.
